# f5distributedcloud_bgp_routing_policy (Resource)

Manages an F5 Distributed Cloud BGP Routing Policy. BGP Routing Policies control BGP route advertisement and filtering.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the BGP Routing Policy.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the BGP Routing Policy is created.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the BGP Routing Policy.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the BGP Routing Policy.
